pageSetting.title: 机构宏观分析

attribute.value: select dmz as key,dmms as value from csb_dmms where dmmc='JGDJ'
select khzbdh as KEY,khzbmc as VALUE from khfa_khzb_jg order by zbpx

select.isEqual: select jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,fxzb.khzbmc, yjzb.zbz, case when (sum(yjzb.zbz) over(partition by fxzb.khzbmc))=0 then 100 else cast (yjzb.zbz/(sum(yjzb.zbz) over(partition by fxzb.khzbmc))*100 as decimal(19,2)) end as zb from yjzb_jg_$tjnf$ yjzb inner join khfa_khzb_jg fxzb on yjzb.zbdh = fxzb.zbdh and yjzb.bz = fxzb.bz and yjzb.sdbs = fxzb.sdbs and yjzb.tjkj = fxzb.tjkj inner join khdx_jg jg on yjzb.khdxdh = jg.khdxdh and jg.jgdj='$jgdj$' inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($tjrq$,$login_khdxdh$,$jgkhdxdh$)) qx on qx.khdxdh = yjzb.khdxdh and qx.khdxdh != 1 where 1=1 and yjzb.tjrq = $tjrq$ and fxzb.khzbdh = $khzb$ and yjzb.zbz > 0 order by yjzb.zbz desc,fxzb.zbpx

select jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,fxzb.zbmc, yjzb.zbz, case when (sum(yjzb.zbz) over(partition by fxzb.zbmc))=0 then 100 else cast (yjzb.zbz/(sum(yjzb.zbz) over(partition by fxzb.zbmc))*100 as decimal(19,2)) end as zb , bz.bzzwmc as bz, dmms_sdbs.dmms as sdbs, dmms_tjkj.dmms as tjkj from yjzb_jg_$tjnf$ yjzb inner join khdx_zb fxzb on yjzb.zbdh = fxzb.zbdh and yjzb.bz = '$bz$' and yjzb.sdbs = '$sdbs$' and yjzb.tjkj = '$tjkj$' inner join csb_bz bz on bz.bz = yjzb.bz inner join khdx_jg jg on yjzb.khdxdh = jg.khdxdh and jg.jgdj='$jgdj$' inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($tjrq$,$login_khdxdh$,$jgkhdxdh$)) qx on qx.khdxdh = yjzb.khdxdh and qx.khdxdh != 1 inner join csb_dmms dmms_sdbs on dmms_sdbs.dmz = yjzb.sdbs and dmms_sdbs.dmmc = 'ZBSDBS' inner join csb_dmms dmms_tjkj on dmms_tjkj.dmz = yjzb.tjkj and dmms_tjkj.dmmc = 'TJKJ' inner join khdx_zblb zblb on zblb.zbdh=fxzb.zbdh and zblb.jsrq=29991231 and zblb.ywlb='$ywlb$' where 1=1 and yjzb.tjrq = $tjrq$ and fxzb.zbdh = $zbdh$ and yjzb.zbz > 0 order by yjzb.zbz desc,fxzb.zbpx
